summary: Adds animations while reading a book, and makes the time advances.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/upload/sagittarius22/sagittarius22_1330707422_Moorelf_1328629167_logo_sagittarius3.png[/img][/center]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35320][img]http://www.ushareimg.com/images/286T3R.png[/img][/url]

[center][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]============================ ENGLISH ============================[/b][/color][/center]

[b]Version:[/b] 2.0
[b]Author:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=972816]Sagittarius22[/url]
[b]Category:[/b] Immersion
[b]Requirement:[/b] //
[b]Description:[/b] This \"simple\" mod adds real-time animations when you begin to read a book. Those animations are only triggered when you read a book that\'s not in your inventory.
While reading, you will get a notification telling you how much time has passed while you ere reading (a random value from 2 to 4 hours). You\'ll be prompted to choose to pick-up, read or cancel whenever you activate a book.
[b]Install[/b]: put the script folder and the ESP file in your DATA folder, then check this mod in your favorite Mod Manager.

[center][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]============================ FRENCH ============================[/b][/color][/center]
[align=center][size=150][b][u] Real Time Reading [/u][/b][/size][/align]

[u]Version[/u] : 1.0

[u]Auteur[/u] : Sagittarius22

[u]Lien VO[/u] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17559

[u]Rubrique de téléchargement[/u] : Jouabilité/Immersion

[u]Prérequis[/u] : Vouloir ajouter un peu de vie au personnage du joueur?

[u]Description[/u] : Ce mod vous permet tout simplement de jouer une animation lorsque vos lisez un livre, mais il fait aussi en sorte que le temps passe lorsque vous lisez. Ainsi, entre deux et quatre heures s\'écouleront lorsque vous déciderez d\'ouvrir un bouquin.
Ce mod ne fonctionne qu\'avec les livres qui ne se trouvent pas dans votre inventaire.
[u]Testeur[/u] : ??

[u]Autorisation[/u] : Yep.

[u]Captures d\'écrans[/u] :

[img]http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/540676522511170244/B9224808DB9132D147CD2AD10C03B75F37976152/[/img]

[img]http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/540676522511151173/602CFF1F15CAF0AF44924BCF2CC99A10EB104EEA/[/img]

[img]http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/540676522511144588/3E85FE8E1B823AE436A458BA3051D415D7F39C35/[/img]

[img]http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/540676522511157793/A8C626226A78449B4451FCF2329D7F6C7280993F/[/img]

[img]http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/540676522511160432/5129619E58C79544B56141759AEC4989BB98C655/[/img]
author: Sagittarius22

files.name: Dropped Books Fix
files.changelogHtml: Dropped books are now taken in count.

files.name: Real Time Reading - French 2dot0
files.changelogHtml: Adds a menu which asks you if you want to read the book, pick it up or cancel!

files.changelogHtml: Adds a menu which asks you if you want to read the book, pick it up or cancel!
